pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Recent Indonesia EarthquakeThis package will get recent earthquake from BMKG (Meteorological, Climatological, and Geophysical Agency)## HOW IT WORKS?This package will scrape from [BMKG](https://www.bmkg.go.id.com) to get recent earthquake happened in IndonesiaThis package will use BeautifulSoup4 and Request, to then produce output in the form of JSON that is ready to be used in web or mobile applications## HOW TO USE import recentearthquake if __name__ == '__main__': result = recentearthquake.ekstraksi_data() recentearthquake.tampilkan_data(result)## AuthorArif Setyadi
